body:
The official trailer for Fast & Furious 7 is coming out 3 weeks from today (10/11/14) on November 1st.  Who's excited to see what goes down? Here's the link where I found this out: http://www.inquisitr.com/1522708/fast-and-furious-7-trailer/

What do you think will happen to Brian O'Connor?

title: Fast & Furious 7 (Discussion thread )

replies.body:

But seriously, not looking forward to it too much... Too many of these... I mean Paul walker is dead so why?

replies.body:
I can't wait for it to come out! :D

My favourite one was Fast 5, it had the most action. :D

I'm wondering something though... did they already start filming the 7th movie when Paul Walker was still alive? If not, are they just not including him in the movie at all?
